pullRequest.title: [LW] Batched get commit timestamps endpoint
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):
We need to batch getting the commit timestamps, as before that got batched with fresh timestamp requests. This is the server side change
Implementation Description (bullets):
The implementation is pretty straightforward, also removed the old jersey stuff as it wasn't being used.
Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):
None
Concerns (what feedback would you like?):
Did I miss anything obvious?
Where should we start reviewing?:
*.yml
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday):
Would like to get it in today, so that we can wire up the client side asap

nodes.bodyText: define this in conjure? seems like a fairly simple object no?
I believe you're going to need to rebase, @j-baker got a similar thing in with #4622

+      base-type: any
+      external:
+        java: com.palantir.lock.watch.CommitTimestampsWithWatches
+    Long:

nodes.bodyText: as above, it's probably just easier to define this object here instead of external, unless you have strong reservations as to why not.

commit.message: Resolve conflicts with develop and address CR
